page.title: 10COMMUNITY GROUPS,LEASINGHAM.
page.content: In{Leasingham}there are a lot of clubs. For instance: on Monday at 6:00p.m.,the{Cub Scout Pack}and the {Brownies}have their meetings.Boys may join the Cubs when they are eight years old and girls must be seven to join the Brownies.At 7:30,{Scouts begins,for boys aged eleven years and over. On Wednesday evenings,there is a {Youth Club}for young people aged twelve years and over,and on Thursday there is a{Darby and Joan Club. On Friday,the{Girl Guides}meet.This is for girls between ten and fourteen years of age.{Play School}is on Monday,Tuesday and Thursday from 9:00a.m.to 12:00 noon. Each week,there are meetings for{Mums {and Tots}and for a{W.I.(Women's {Institute) Group.
